text: doesn't timestamp hold a full date in the hs backend?
<@U011H02FR3Q> we’re using oauth and the rest api, which REST api call returned that payload?
<@U02BTB5A9KP> this is just the contacts API

I am wondering if you actually need an API key for this as its an old API, or OAuth 2.0 server to server so that you can request contacts. The reason why this endpoint would be protected just in case someone has set up a field like `is_customer_mega_interested`  and sales agent puts something silly there

Hey I just upgraded to using V3 api with the HubSpot npm package. I am seeing a really long delay between creating a new contact and when HubSpot can actually return the user. Is anyone else running into this issue?
basically doing `POST /crm/v3/objects/contacts` then after I wait for it to complete
I do another request `POST /crm/v3/objects/contacts/search` but it gives me an error of not being able to find the user
If I do a 5 second delay, the user shows up
In V1 I was able to do it immediately
Anyone else running into this issue?
Unfortunatelly not, only date, I asked to the HubSpot support, but thank you anyway

Heya all, Does anyone know if we can get/find the Quote status via Quotes API?

I know that there is hs_status being return upon GET but I am looking into more of a current status of the Quote - say if the Quote is accepted and Signed then it should say Accepted or Signed. Note: This gets reflect on the front end (Under  Sales > Quotes) but in the API it doesn't say that status.

Instead it comes with - *APPROVAL_NOT_NEEDED* which doesn't make sense.

Can anyone help me understand what's happening?
